description: Detects the execution of a renamed "client32.exe" (NetSupport RAT) via Imphash, Product and OriginalFileName strings
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Renamed NetSupport RAT Execution
query: (((Product:*NetSupport\ Remote\ Control*) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:*client32.exe*) OR (winlog.event_data.Imphash:"a9d50692e95b79723f3e76fcf70d023e") OR (winlog.event_data.Hashes:*IMPHASH\=A9D50692E95B79723F3E76FCF70D023E*)) AND (NOT process.executable.text:"*\\client32.exe"))
